verses.verse: O you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, gather yourselves to <S%H5756>flee<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H8620>Tekoa<s%>, and set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4864>sign<s%> of fire in <S%H1021>Beth<s%>â€“haccerem: for <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8259>appeared<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.
I have <S%H1820>likened<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to a <S%H5116>fitting<s%> and delicate <S%H6026>woman<s%>.

The <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> with their <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H8628>her<s%>; they shall pitch their <S%H168>tents<s%> against her round <S%H5439>about<s%>; they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H3027>place<s%>.

<S%H6942>Prepare<s%> you <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H6965>her<s%>; arise, and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>. <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto <S%H3117>us<s%>! for the day goes <S%H6437>away<s%>, for the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> are stretched <S%H5186>out<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> her <S%H759>palaces<s%>.

For thus has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Hew you <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H6097>trees<s%>, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mountain<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: this is the <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H6485>visited<s%>; she is wholly <S%H6233>oppression<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>her<s%>.

As a <S%H953>fountain<s%> casts <S%H6979>out<s%> her <S%H4325>waters<s%>, so she casts <S%H6979>out<s%> her <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>plunder<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6440>her<s%>; before me <S%H8548>continually<s%> is <S%H2483>grief<s%> and <S%H4347>wounds<s%>.

Be you <S%H3256>instructed<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, lest my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3363>depart<s%> from <S%H7760>you<s%>; lest I make you <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> not <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, They shall <S%H5953>throughly<s%> <S%H5953>glean<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as a <S%H1612>vine<s%>: turn <S%H7725>back<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> as a <S%H1219>grapegatherer<s%> into the <S%H5552>baskets<s%>.

To whom shall I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and give <S%H5749>warning<s%>, that they may <S%H8085>hear<s%>? <S%H241>behold<s%>, their ear is <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, and they <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%>: <S%H1697>behold<s%>, the word of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is unto them a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; they have no delight in <S%H2654>it<s%>.

Therefore I am <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with holding <S%H3557>in<s%>: I will pour it <S%H8210>out<s%> upon the <S%H5768>sons<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, and upon the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: for even the <S%H376>husband<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%>, the <S%H2205>aged<s%> with him that is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> unto <S%H312>others<s%>, with their <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: for I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For from the <S%H6996>least<s%> of them even unto the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> of them every one is <S%H1214>given<s%> to <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>; and from the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> even unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> every one <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>.

They have <S%H7495>healed<s%> also the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7043>slightly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%>, <S%H7965>peace<s%>; when there is no <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

Were they <S%H3001>ashamed<s%> when they had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%>? <S%H1571>No<s%>, they were not at <S%H954>all<s%> <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3045>could<s%> they <S%H3637>blush<s%>: therefore they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> among them that <S%H5307>fall<s%>: at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> them they shall be cast <S%H3782>down<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H5975>Stand<s%> you in the <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H7592>ask<s%> for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5410>paths<s%>, where is the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H4672>it<s%>, and you shall find <S%H4771>rest<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>. But they <S%H559>said<s%>, We will not walk in <S%H3212>it<s%>.
Also I <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> over <S%H7181>you<s%>, saying, Listen to the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>. But they <S%H559>said<s%>, We will not <S%H7181>listen<s%>.
Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%>, you <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%>, O <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, what is among them.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H935>behold<s%>, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H5971>people<s%>, even the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>, because they have not <S%H7181>listened<s%> unto my <S%H1697>words<s%>, nor to my <S%H8451>law<s%>, but rejected <S%H3988>it<s%>.

To what purpose <S%H935>comes<s%> there to me <S%H3828>incense<s%> from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>, and the <S%H2896>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>? your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> are not <S%H7522>acceptable<s%>, nor your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> sweet unto <S%H6149>me<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will lay <S%H4383>stumblingblocks<s%> before this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> upon <S%H7934>them<s%>; the neighbor and his <S%H7453>friend<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, a people <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall be <S%H5782>raised<s%> from the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

They shall lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H3591>spear<s%>; they are <S%H394>cruel<s%>, and have no <S%H7355>mercy<s%>; their <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H1993>roars<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and they <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, set in <S%H6186>array<s%> as <S%H376>men<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H1323>you<s%>, O daughter of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8089>fame<s%> <S%H3027>there<s%>: our hands become <S%H7503>feeble<s%>: <S%H6869>anguish<s%> has taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H2427>us<s%>, and pain, as of a woman in <S%H3205>hardship<s%>.

Go not <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>, nor <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>; for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H4032>fear<s%> is on every <S%H5439>side<s%>.

O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H2296>clothe<s%> yourselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H6428>wallow<s%> in <S%H665>ashes<s%>: <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%>, as for a only <S%H3173>son<s%>, most <S%H8563>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation<s%>: for the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> shall <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> come upon <S%H935>us<s%>.
I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you for a <S%H969>tower<s%> and a <S%H4013>fortress<s%> among my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H974>try<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%>.
They are all <S%H5493>severe<s%> <S%H5637>rebels<s%>, <S%H1980>walking<s%> with <S%H7400>slanders<s%>: they are <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%>; they are all <S%H7843>corrupters<s%>.

The <S%H4647>bellows<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%>, the <S%H5777>lead<s%> is <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H800>fire<s%>; the <S%H6884>founder<s%> <S%H6884>melts<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>: for the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> are not plucked <S%H5423>away<s%>.
<S%H3988>Reprobate<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall men <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, because the Lord has rejected <S%H3988>them<s%>.
